document_data.name: Two-bladed sword
document_data.mainbody: A '''two-bladed sword''', or '''double-sword''', was an exotic two-handed variety of [[sword]].{{Cite comic/The Gathering|12}}
document_data.Description: The two-bladed sword was approximately the same length as a [[greatsword]] or a [[quarterstaff]], but had two [[short sword]]-sized blades at each end.
document_data.Weaponology: It took special training to wield a two-bladed sword effectively.
